entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
